nl.uu.cs.ape.sat.models

Class AtomMapping

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.uu.cs.ape.sat.models.AtomMapping

  • public class AtomMapping
extends java.lang.Object
    Class is used to store the data used for representing the atoms with integer numbers. Atoms are not a separate data structure, but a string combination of a TaxonomyPredicate and a State as am argument.
    Required for the SAT representation of the CNF formula.
    Author:
    Vedran Kasalica

        public AtomMapping()

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public java.lang.Integer add(Predicate predicate,
                             State usedInState,
                             WorkflowElement elementType)
        Function is returning the mapping number of the predicate(argument). If the Atom did not occur before, it is added to the mapping set and the mapping value is returned, otherwise the existing mapping value is returned.
        Parameters:
        predicate - - predicate of the mapped atom
        usedInState - - argument of the mapped atom (usually name of the type/module state)
        Returns:
        Mapping number of the atom (number is always > 0)

      • findMapping

        public java.lang.Integer findMapping(Atom atom)
        Return the mapping value (Integer) for the atom. If the atom was not mapped it returns null.
        Parameters:
        atom - - string representation of the atom
        Returns:
        mapping of the atom

      • findOriginal

        public Atom findOriginal(java.lang.Integer mapping)
        Return the mapping value (Integer) for theatom. If the atom was not mapped it returns null.
        Parameters:
        mapping - - Integer mapping of the atom
        Returns:
        The original atom

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns the size of the mapping set.
        Returns:

      • getNextAuxNum

        public int getNextAuxNum()
        Get the next auxiliary number and increase the counter by 1.
        Returns:
        Mapping number that can be used for auxiliary variables.

      • resetAuxVariables

        public void resetAuxVariables()

      • getCurrNumOfMappedAuxVar

        public int getCurrNumOfMappedAuxVar()
        Get the number of mapped auxiliary variables that are not part of the solution.
        Returns:
        Number of mapped auxiliary variables.

      • getMaxNumOfMappedAuxVar

        public int getMaxNumOfMappedAuxVar()
        Get the max number of mapped auxiliary variables that are not part of the solution.
        Returns:
        Max number of possible mapped auxiliary variables.
